item.title: Garbage collection configuration
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop There are a number of settings related to the .NET garbage collector (GC) which can be set at runtime using a variety of methods. Generally these do not need to be manually configured, but can be changed from the default to tweak and optimize performance of the application. Configurations The settings which can be configured are listed below (more detailed information can be found under references section below)
